Synopis:

After returning back home to his Texas ranch at the end of the Civil War, Chad Morgan (Alan Ladd) who had served as an officer in the Confederacy, discovers that his neighbours are experiencing financial hardship due to their inability to find a buyer for their herds. Chad convinces the ranchers to drive their cattle to a Missouri railhead where representatives from Eastern city markets will be waiting to bid for them for good prices. When the ranchers arrive at the railhead however, they find that a single buyer,  Brog (Anthony Caruso) has driven away all the competition and is offering only $1.50 a head, rather than the ten dollars they expected. Forced to accept Brog's offer, the ranchers feel betrayed by Chad, whom they hold responsible.
